name: Marble Race: Labyrinth Racing Challenge
description:
Marbles Race is a simple game: collect all the coins and get to the portal in the fastest possible time. What's not so simple are the crazy mazes, moving platforms, or the rest of the tricky obstacles.

Marbles Race was inspired by Marble Madness. Adding a 3 Star rating system and beautiful graphics was our genius idea. Download now and see why Marbles Race is the game to play and beat!

+ Over Fifty Free Courses
+ Easy to learn but hard to master
+ Awesome gameplay with amazing graphics
+ New courses updated on the regular
+ Download now and climb the ranks of the leaderboards

Got any suggestions or comments? Drop us a line at support@gamemasons.net We'd love to hear what you got to say.
